about_the_game:
秘传·古明地无心流秘籍 None-Heart Secret Sword is a Guide Book and Art Book of Halluci-Sabbat of Koishi.
This book includes the overall strategy of the game, including all the enemies Koishi will face, all the skills she can master, and all the illustrations and art resources in the game.
Full color 90 Pages, carefully arranged and crafted with craftsmanship.

· Including 45 large pages (90P)

· Including 30+ Secret Skills, with illustrations, introductions, and usage tips

· The first 53 pages contain the process of completing all three outcomes, as well as the techniques for attacking bosses, and information on all enemiess

· The last 37 pages contain 14 exquisite high-definition illustrations, with over 20 game CGs scattered throughout the book

The downloaded DLC is viewed in the game 【root directory/DLC/Guide Book - None-Heart Secret Sword】
